pages.text: Hypocaust is a central heating system. Heat input from the central block (firebox) and spreads to a relatively large area.
$(l:intro/kitchen_materials)Kitchen materials$(/l) can be used to make hypocaust, except mud.Since it's unstable and not waterproof.

In building hypocaust systems, firebox and caliducts should be connected horizontally and the firebox should be put on heat source, like $(l:intro/stove)stoves$(/l) or $(l:worldgen/volcanic_fumarole)fumarole vent$(/l).

Heated hypocaust system would heat water above it into bath water with steam. When inside bath water, one can gain experience gradually, But this process is very slow. A firebox can heat up a 9x9 area near it.
A way of building hypocaust bath.
